ExampleDefinition.Description:
Showcases how to synchronize mouse events across multiple charts by using the MouseManager.MouseEventGroup attached property.
Two SciChartSurface panes are created and arranged vertically. This example shows how to synchronize Zoom, Pan, Rollover and Cursor operations using MVVM to enable and disable ChartModifiers.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
All charts are synchronized by using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Core~SciChart.Core.Utility.Mouse.MouseManager_members.html']MouseManager.MouseEventGroup[/url] attached property and by TwoWay binding all [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Axes.AxisCore~VisibleRange.html']XAxis.VisibleRange[/url] properties to a common ViewModel property.
Chart YAxis sizes are synchronized using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.TradeChart.SciChartGroup~VerticalChartGroupProperty.html']SciChartGroup.VerticalChartGroupId[/url] attached property.
